patthana24.15:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.15:4.2: Naaraṇaṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.15:4.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.15:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.15:5.2: Naaraṇaṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.15:5.4: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
